title: @Riot - A request
body:
So my friend (summoner name 'gangulous') is rather new to the game. She spent the majority of Ocean Week playing normals with me and a handful of our friends but did not realize that it was a requirement to 'enroll' in order to receive the Ocean Week rewards. When we figured this out last night we managed to pull her to 9 points. Sadly we just lost the last 2 aram games before the Twelve O'Clock deadline.

Would there be any way to give her a final point or to ensure her spot on the public mural?

replies.body: Send Riot  a support ticket. I highly doubt they will, but it's worth a shot, I guess.
